contest-event.event-date:
July 16, 1927 D Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 4)
Oxfordshire & District Contest (Section 4) 40 Test Piece Contest Oxfordshire & District Contest oxfordshire-district-contest-section-4
None
La Fete Champetre
White House Ground, Abingdon Road, Oxford, Oxfordshire, UK Open to Berks, Bucks, and Oxon bands who had not won a cash prize exceeding £5 since 1921.
1st prize: Fred Foreman Cup, £5 2nd prize: £3 3rd prize: £2 Medals for best euphonium, best set of basses (3), but should winning band play onto two basses, the third medal shall be awarded at the discretion of the adjudicator.
March 23, 2017, 10:55 a.m. March 29, 2017, 11:08 a.m.
1 High Wycombe Borough H. J. Rolfe
2 Brackley Borough A. Smith
3 Fairford Silver L. Adams
Unknown Result Abingdon Town Band R. Daniels
Unknown Result Flackwell Heath W. J. Burnham
Withdrawn Brackley Town E. H. Blackwell
Withdrawn Marlow Town Band G. Pettergill
